actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to food assistance to Cambodia.

summary.text: Provides that not less than 50 percent of the food commodities budgeted for Cambodia shall be made available in Cambodia for humanitarian purposes. Directs that such food be administered by voluntary agencies already established in Cambodia.

titles.title: Resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to food assistance to Cambodia.
